name: St Joseph's Health Centre - Guelph - Westmount Rd - Out n' About Day Program
comment:
Adult day program * social, recreational, and therapeutic activities for frail older adults with depression, social isolation concerns, and/or early stages of dementia in a group setting for part of the day * helps to support family caregivers who provide day-to-day care
